section.name: Examples
section.p: The following section contains two examples, starting with the minimal and continuing with a full example.

subsection.name: Full Example
subsection.pre:
<build> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>net.sourceforge.jpotpourri</groupId> <artifactId>maven-buildmac-plugin</artifactId> <version>0.1-SNAPSHOT</version> <configuration>
<!-- custom app name instead of ${project.name} --> <appName>My OS X Application</appName>
<!-- custom version instead of ${project.version} --> <appVersion>1.0</appVersion>
<!-- optional application logo --> <appIcon>macRsrc/logo.icns</appIcon>
<!-- either specify already existing file, or configurate values in POM --> <!-- <plistInfo>macRsrc/Info.plist</plistInfo> --> <plistInfoParams> <MainClass>package.App</MainClass>
<!-- will be displayed in info dialog for .app, next to "Version:" --> <CFBundleGetInfoString>This is my mac app.</CFBundleGetInfoString>
<!-- will be displayed in about dialog within parenthesis () --> <CFBundleVersion>42</CFBundleVersion>
<!-- will be displayed in about dialog next to parenthesis (); default: ${project.version} --> <CFBundleShortVersionString>1.0</CFBundleShortVersionString>
<!-- default: ${project.name} --> <CFBundleName>My App</CFBundleName> </plistInfoParams>
<!-- either specify already existing file, or configurate values in POM --> <!-- <plistVersion>macRsrc/version.plist</plistVersion> --> <plistVersionParams>
<!-- default: ${project.version} --> <CFBundleShortVersionString>42</CFBundleShortVersionString>
<!-- default: ${project.name} --> <ProjectName>My App</ProjectName> </plistVersionParams>
<!-- optional resources which should be copied to *.app/Contents/Resources --> <additionalResources> <param>macRsrc/additionalResource.txt</param> </additionalResources>
</configuration> </plugin> </plugins> </build>
